_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

How to be freed [sn22.72:1.13]: Not grasping any kind of form at all
Not grasping any kind of feeling at all
Not grasping any kind of perception at all
Not grasping any kind of choices at all
Not grasping any kind of consciousness at all
With right understanding: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
